body: Yeah, I was surprised when I read this code, because it is actually _wrong_. Unwrapping a variable along the python<->c++ boundary is not an accurate conversion of the same object into C++. Wherever this is used needs to be updated to unwrap the variables manually.
body_html: Yeah, I was surprised when I read this code, because it is actually wrong. Unwrapping a variable along the python<->c++ boundary is not an accurate conversion of the same object into C++. Wherever this is used needs to be updated to unwrap the variables manually.
body_text: Yeah, I was surprised when I read this code, because it is actually wrong. Unwrapping a variable along the python<->c++ boundary is not an accurate conversion of the same object into C++. Wherever this is used needs to be updated to unwrap the variables manually.
